div.p: H75/4391, unit 805, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending
30thJune 1875.

cell.p:
Collecting Botanical Specimens, clerical assistance etc.
MS addition in an unknown hand: '[…]'.

cell.style: border-top: none; border-left: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.0069in solid #000000; border-right: 0.0104in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.075in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.075in;
cell.p:
300
300 deleted in another hand, with 100 written below together with an addition of the two amounts yielding 400.

cell.p:
Total -
Fifty pounds --- shillings
and --- pen
